title: Free Grant of UDA land at Ratnapura New Town to the University Grants Commission to handover the same to the University of Sabaragamuwa, Sri Lanka
decision_details: the proposal made by H.E. the President, in his capacity as the Minister of Defence and Urban Development, to allocate a land at Ratnapura New Town near the General Hospital, in extent of about 20 Acres, to the University Grants Commission to handover same to the University of Sabaragamuwa, Sri Lanka, to establish the Faculty of Health Sciences of the said University, was approved by the Cabinet.
